===MavenRepo===
to use Reflections via a maven repository, configure your pom.xml with
{{{
<repository>
    <id>reflections-repo</id>
    <name>Reflections Maven2 Repository</name>
    <url>http://reflections.googlecode.com/svn/repo</url>
</repository>
}}}

than add a dependency to Reflections in your pom.xml
{{{
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.reflections</groupId>
    <artifactId>reflections</artifactId>
    <version>the latest version...</version>
</dependency>
}}}
